text: Phira isa tom ba'ada tuhade dila sakhata hom ga'e. Akhira uha pathara varage ho ga'e jam usa tom vi zi'ada sakhata. Patharam vica kujha ajihe vi hude hana jinham com nahiram phuta nikaladi'am hana, kujha pathara pata jande hana ate unham vicom pani nikala a'unda hai ate kujha pathara ajihe vi hude hana jihare alaha de dara nala diga painde hana. Ate alaha usa tom anajana nahim hai jo kujha tusim karade ho
